Package algorithms.compGeometry.clustering.twopointcorrelation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGroupFinder
    interface for classes that find groups of points based upon the background threshhold density.
    IPointBackgroundStats
    interface for classes which supply an estimate of the background void density
    ITwoPointIdentity
    interface for classes used to hold a point identity pair uniquely.
    IVoidFinder
    interface for classes that find the voids (that is, space between points) in the dataset
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGroupFinder  
    AbstractPointBackgroundStats
    abstract class for implementations of IPointBackgroundStats to do some of the boiler plate code such as file persistence
    AbstractVoidFinder  
    AxisIndexer
    Class to hold x and y array of points whose values have been indexed by increasing x and y.
    CompleteSamplingVoidFinder
    an implementation of VoidFinder that uses complete sampling to determine the background (void) point density.
    DFSGroupFinder
    An implementation of IGroupFinder that uses a depth first search algorithm to visit all nodes in a dataset and put into groups those within distance < threshhold * threshholdFactor from each other.
    DivideAndConquerVoidFinder
    an implementation of IVoidFinder that uses a divide and conquer approach to sampling the data.
    Main
    Usage from the command line: Requires a tab delimited text file with 4 columns: x, y, xErrors, yErrors.
    PerformanceMetricsRunner
    estimates performance metrics for TwoPointCorrelation as the dependencies upon N of the amount of memory needed and the runtime.
    RandomClusterAndBackgroundGenerator
    utility class for unit tests which need to create random background points and points in clusters.
    SerializerUtil
    a utility class for serializing and de-serializing the indexer contents to the file system
    SimpleLinkedListNode
    a node holding only a integer key and the next reference.
    SubsetSamplingVoidFinder
    an instance of IVoidFinder that uses a subsection of the AxisIndexer data.
    TwoPointBinarySearchTree
    A holder for two-point identities, where the identities are the indexes of the indexer internal arrays.
    TwoPointCorrelation
    Find clusters in data.
    TwoPointCorrelationPlotter
    Convenience class to create a plot to visualize results of the Two-Point correlation code.
    TwoPointHash
    A holder for two-point identities, where the identities are the indexes of the indexer internal arrays.
    TwoPointHashMap
    A holder for two-point identities, where the identities are the indexes of the indexer internal arrays.
    TwoPointIdentityFactory
    creates an instance of ITwoPointIdentity
    TwoPointVoidStats
    Class to estimate a background density for a set of points in which the background density will be used by the calling program to find clusters, that is groups of points associated by proximity, in the data.
    TwoPointVoidStatsPlotter
    code to produce plots for visualizing the results of and debugging TwoPointVoidStats
    VoidReader
    a class to read a persisted set of background void points
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RandomClusterAndBackgroundGenerator.CLUSTER_SEPARATION  
    TwoPointCorrelation.BACKGROUND_METHOD  
    TwoPointCorrelation.STATE  
    TwoPointVoidStats.State  
    VoidSampling
    enumeration of types of sampling for the background void points
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TwoPointVoidStatsException
